Headline: #63 63rd Temporary Southbound Reroute near 63rd/State
ShortDescription: Southbound 63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 63rd, Prairie, 59th, Yale, and 63rd due to, street blockage near 63rd/State.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 63rd, Prairie, 59th, Yale, and 63rd due to, street blockage near 63rd/State.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #54 Cicero Temporary Reroute at Cicero/Lake
ShortDescription: 54 Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted via Cicero, Washington, Laramie, Chicago, and Cicero due to, a fire near Cicero/Lake.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#54 Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted via Cicero, Washington, Laramie, Chicago, and Cicero due to, a fire near Cicero/Lake.

Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier sick customer at Cermak. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier sick customer at Cermak. 

 Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
